snippet: The outbreak of the disease is already the largest and deadliest ever, according to the the World Health Organization, which has put the death toll at 399 as of June 23, out of 635 cases.
abstract: World Health Organization reports number of deaths attributed to an epidemic of Ebola virus in Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone rose to 467 out of 759 total known cases and is largest outbreak of disease ever.
lead_paragraph: The outbreak of the disease is already the largest and deadliest ever, according to the the World Health Organization, which has put the death toll at 399 as of June 23, out of 635 cases.
